tool_description: Evaluates potential impacts of mining operations on local flora, fauna, and ecosystem services.

habitat_types.description: Types of habitats present (forest, grassland, wetland, etc.)

endangered_species.description: List of endangered or threatened species in the area

habitat_area.description: Total habitat area to be impacted in hectares

migration_corridors.description: Whether the area contains wildlife migration corridors

water_dependency.description: Ecosystem water dependency level (low, medium, high)

error_messages: Empty habitat types: At least one habitat type must be specified.
Invalid habitat area: Habitat area must be positive.
Invalid water dependency: Use low, medium, or high.
Invalid seasonal data: Seasons must be spring, summer, autumn, or winter.
usage: Provide habitat information, species data, and ecosystem characteristics to evaluate biodiversity impacts and conservation requirements.

impact_severity.description: Overall biodiversity impact severity (minimal, moderate, significant, severe)

species_at_risk.description: Species likely to be negatively impacted

habitat_loss_percentage.description: Percentage of habitat area to be lost

critical_periods.description: Time periods when operations should be restricted
